02454 BOOLEAN ShadowVideoSurfaceImage( UINT32   uiDestVSurface, HVOBJECT hImageHandle, INT32 iPosX, INT32 iPosY)
02455 {
02456       //Horizontal shadow
02457       ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( uiDestVSurface, iPosX+3, iPosY+hImageHandle->pETRLEObject->usHeight, iPosX+hImageHandle->pETRLEObject->usWidth, iPosY+  hImageHandle->pETRLEObject->usHeight+3);
02458 
02459       //vertical shadow
02460       ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( uiDestVSurface, iPosX+hImageHandle->pETRLEObject->usWidth, iPosY+3, iPosX+hImageHandle->pETRLEObject->usWidth+3, iPosY+ hImageHandle->pETRLEObject->usHeight);
02461       return( TRUE );
02462 }
02463 
02464 BOOLEAN MakeVSurfaceFromVObject(UINT32 uiVObject, UINT16 usSubIndex, UINT32 *puiVSurface)
02465 {
02466 HVOBJECT hSrcVObject;
02467 UINT32 uiVSurface;
02468 VSURFACE_DESC hDesc;
02469 
02470       if(GetVideoObject(&hSrcVObject, uiVObject))
02471       {
02472             // ATE: Memset
02473             memset( &hDesc, 0, sizeof( VSURFACE_DESC ) );
02474             hDesc.fCreateFlags=VSURFACE_CREATE_DEFAULT;
02475             hDesc.usWidth=hSrcVObject->pETRLEObject[ usSubIndex ].usWidth;
02476             hDesc.usHeight=hSrcVObject->pETRLEObject[ usSubIndex ].usHeight;
02477             hDesc.ubBitDepth=PIXEL_DEPTH;
02478 
02479             if(AddVideoSurface(&hDesc, &uiVSurface))
02480             {
02481                   if(BltVideoObjectFromIndex(uiVSurface, uiVObject, usSubIndex, 0, 0, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL))
02482                   {
02483                         *puiVSurface=uiVSurface;
02484                         return(TRUE);
02485                   }
02486                   else
02487                         DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex(uiVSurface);
02488             }
02489       }           
02490       
02491       return(FALSE);
02492 }

02494 #ifdef _DEBUG
02495 void CheckValidVSurfaceIndex( UINT32 uiIndex )
02496 {
02497       BOOLEAN fAssertError = FALSE;
02498       if( uiIndex == 0xffffffff )
02499       { //-1 index -- deleted
02500             fAssertError = TRUE;
02501       }
02502       else if( uiIndex % 2 && uiIndex < 0xfffffff0  )
02503       { //odd numbers are reserved for vobjects
02504             fAssertError = TRUE;
02505       }
02506 
02507       if( fAssertError )
02508       {
02509             UINT8 str[60];
02510             switch( gubVSDebugCode )
02511             {
02512                   case DEBUGSTR_SETVIDEOSURFACETRANSPARENCY:
02513                         sprintf( (char *)str, "SetVideoSurfaceTransparency" );
02514                         break;
02515                   case DEBUGSTR_ADDVIDEOSURFACEREGION:
02516                         sprintf( (char *)str, "AddVideoSurfaceRegion" );
02517                         break;
02518                   case DEBUGSTR_GETVIDEOSURFACEDESCRIPTION:
02519                         sprintf( (char *)str, "GetVideoSurfaceDescription" );
02520                         break;
02521                   case DEBUGSTR_BLTVIDEOSURFACE_DST:
02522                         sprintf( (char *)str, "BltVideoSurface (dest)" );
02523                         break;
02524                   case DEBUGSTR_BLTVIDEOSURFACE_SRC:
02525                         sprintf( (char *)str, "BltVideoSurface (src)" );
02526                         break;
02527                   case DEBUGSTR_COLORFILLVIDEOSURFACEAREA:
02528                         sprintf( (char *)str, "ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea" );
02529                         break;
02530                   case DEBUGSTR_SHADOWVIDEOSURFACERECT:
02531                         sprintf( (char *)str, "ShadowVideoSurfaceRect" );
02532                         break;
02533                   case DEBUGSTR_BLTSTRETCHVIDEOSURFACE_DST:
02534                         sprintf( (char *)str, "BltStretchVideoSurface (dest)" );
02535                         break;
02536                   case DEBUGSTR_BLTSTRETCHVIDEOSURFACE_SRC:
02537                         sprintf( (char *)str, "BltStretchVideoSurface (src)" );
02538                         break;
02539                   case DEBUGSTR_DELETEVIDEOSURFACEFROMINDEX:
02540                         sprintf( (char *)str, "DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex" );
02541                         break;
02542                   case DEBUGSTR_NONE:
02543                   default:
02544                         sprintf( (char *)str, "GetVideoSurface" );
02545                         break;
02546             }
02547             if( uiIndex == 0xffffffff )
02548             {
02549                   AssertMsg( 0, String( "Trying to %s with deleted index -1." , str ) );
02550             }
02551             else
02552             {
02553                   AssertMsg( 0, String( "Trying to %s using a VOBJECT ID %d!", str, uiIndex ) );
02554             }
02555       }
02556 }

02559 #ifdef SGP_VIDEO_DEBUGGING
02560 typedef struct DUMPFILENAME
02561 {
02562       UINT8 str[256];
02563 }DUMPFILENAME;
02564 void DumpVSurfaceInfoIntoFile( UINT8 *filename, BOOLEAN fAppend )
02565 {
02566       VSURFACE_NODE *curr;
02567       FILE *fp;
02568       DUMPFILENAME *pName, *pCode;
02569       UINT32 *puiCounter;
02570       UINT8 tempName[ 256 ];
02571       UINT8 tempCode[ 256 ];
02572       UINT32 i, uiUniqueID;
02573       BOOLEAN fFound;
02574       if( !guiVSurfaceSize )
02575       {
02576             return;
02577       }
02578 
02579       if( fAppend )
02580       {
02581             fp = fopen( (const char *)filename, "a" );
02582       }
02583       else
02584       {
02585             fp = fopen( (const char *)filename, "w" );
02586       }
02587       Assert( fp );
02588 
02589       //Allocate enough strings and counters for each node.
02590       pName = (DUMPFILENAME*)MemAlloc( sizeof( DUMPFILENAME ) * guiVSurfaceSize );
02591       pCode = (DUMPFILENAME*)MemAlloc( sizeof( DUMPFILENAME ) * guiVSurfaceSize );
02592       memset( pName, 0, sizeof( DUMPFILENAME ) * guiVSurfaceSize );
02593       memset( pCode, 0, sizeof( DUMPFILENAME ) * guiVSurfaceSize );
02594       puiCounter = (UINT32*)MemAlloc( 4 * guiVSurfaceSize );
02595       memset( puiCounter, 0, 4 * guiVSurfaceSize );
02596 
02597       //Loop through the list and record every unique filename and count them
02598       uiUniqueID = 0;
02599       curr = gpVSurfaceHead;
02600       while( curr )
02601       {
02602             strcpy( tempName, curr->pName );
02603             strcpy( tempCode, curr->pCode );
02604             fFound = FALSE;
02605             for( i = 0; i < uiUniqueID; i++ )
02606             {
02607                   if( !_stricmp( tempName, pName[i].str ) && !_stricmp( tempCode, pCode[i].str ) )
02608                   { //same string
02609                         fFound = TRUE;
02610                         (puiCounter[ i ])++;
02611                         break;
02612                   }
02613             }
02614             if( !fFound )
02615             {
02616                   strcpy( pName[i].str, tempName );
02617                   strcpy( pCode[i].str, tempCode );
02618                   (puiCounter[ i ])++;
02619                   uiUniqueID++;
02620             }
02621             curr = curr->next;
02622       }
02623 
02624       //Now dump the info.
02625       fprintf( fp, "-----------------------------------------------\n" );
02626       fprintf( fp, "%d unique vSurface names exist in %d VSurfaces\n", uiUniqueID, guiVSurfaceSize );
02627       fprintf( fp, "-----------------------------------------------\n\n" );
02628       for( i = 0; i < uiUniqueID; i++ )
02629       {
02630             fprintf( fp, "%d occurrences of %s\n", puiCounter[i], pName[i].str );
02631             fprintf( fp, "%s\n\n", pCode[i].str );
02632       }
02633       fprintf( fp, "\n-----------------------------------------------\n\n" );
02634 
02635       //Free all memory associated with this operation.
02636       MemFree( pName );
02637       MemFree( pCode );
02638       MemFree( puiCounter );
02639       fclose( fp );
02640 }

02642 //Debug wrapper for adding vsurfaces
02643 template <typename type4>
02644 BOOLEAN _AddAndRecordVSurface( VSURFACE_DESC *VSurfaceDesc, UINT32 *uiIndex, UINT32 uiLineNum, type4 pSourceFile )
02645 {
02646       UINT16 usLength;
02647       UINT8 str[256];
02648       if( !AddStandardVideoSurface( VSurfaceDesc, uiIndex ) )
02649       {
02650             return FALSE;
02651       }
02652 
02653       //record the filename of the vsurface (some are created via memory though)
02654       usLength = strlen( VSurfaceDesc->ImageFile ) + 1;
02655       gpVSurfaceTail->pName = (UINT8*)MemAlloc( usLength );
02656       memset( gpVSurfaceTail->pName, 0, usLength );
02657       strcpy( gpVSurfaceTail->pName, VSurfaceDesc->ImageFile );
02658 
02659       //record the code location of the calling creating function.
02660       sprintf( (char *) str, "%s -- line(%d)", pSourceFile, uiLineNum );
02661       usLength = strlen( str ) + 1;
02662       gpVSurfaceTail->pCode = (UINT8*)MemAlloc( usLength );
02663       memset( gpVSurfaceTail->pCode, 0, usLength );
02664       strcpy( gpVSurfaceTail->pCode, str );
02665 
02666       return TRUE;
02667 }
